alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf; Jackson; Liberty; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 2:44PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Jackson, northwestern Gulf, Bay and Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, northwestern Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida and southeastern Washington Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 315 PM EDT/215 PM CDT/... At 244 PM EDT/144 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles north of Blountstown to 20 miles northwest of Stonemill Creek to near Tyndall Air Force Base. Movement was northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Blountstown, Springfield, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, Parker, Altha, Rock Bluff, Moose Pond, Clarksville, Ocheesee, Selman, Abe Springs, Allanton, Dirego Park, College Station and West Panama City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf; Jackson; Liberty; Washington
